AGENT_5_PARALLEL_LOOP_INTEGRATION.description: Merge Zapier Copilot automation with Agent 5.0 master orchestration loop

responsibilities: Delegate to appropriate division or co-primary agent
Aggregate results and report to user

zapier_copilot_co_primary.role: Automation and FREE tool extraction specialist
responsibilities: Build all Zapier workflows (NO custom coding)
Execute recurring automations (24/7 trading, hourly bonds, daily dashboards)
Write code when Zapier can't handle it

user_request_intake.step_1: User submits request (Slack, email, Zapier chatbot, etc.)
user_request_intake.step_3: Master CFO routes to appropriate handler

result_aggregation.step_1: All co-primary agents and divisions execute in parallel

parallel_execution_loop.description: All systems run continuously 24/7 in parallel

bonds_trading_loop.workflow: Schedule → Webhook (fetch bond data) → Gemini analysis → Google Sheets → Slack (if opportunity)

forex_crypto_loop.workflow: TradingView alert → Webhook → Filter → Claude + ChatGPT → Google Sheets → Slack

api_health_loop.workflow: Schedule → Test all 5 APIs → Google Sheets dashboard → Slack (if failures)

trading_dashboard_loop.workflow: Schedule → Query Google Sheets → Calculate stats → Gemini insights → Update dashboard → Slack

client_intake_loop.workflow: Google Forms → Zapier chatbot → Airtable → Welcome email → Calendar appointment → Slack notification

code_review_loop.workflow: GitHub push → GitLab mirror sync → GitLab Duo review → Suggestions → Merge if approved

master_cfo_monitoring_loop.workflow: Monitor all loops → Detect issues → Delegate fixes → Validate resolution → Update user

UNFINISHED_TASKS_COMPLETE_DELEGATION.description: All tasks mentioned but not completed - delegated to appropriate agents

unfinished_items.task: Complete 8000-word master prompts for all 8 divisions
unfinished_items.handler: GitLab Duo AI (using GitLab's training data)

unfinished_items.task: Build Zapier zap: 24/7 Bonds Trading Automation
steps: Open Zapier Editor
Create new zap: '24/7 Bonds Trading Automation'
Trigger: Schedule by Zapier (every hour)
Action 1: Webhooks - GET https://api.fiscaldata.treasury.gov/services/api/fiscal_service/v2/accounting/od/avg_interest_rates
Action 2: Code by Zapier - Parse JSON bond data
Action 3: Google Gemini - Analyze bonds with prompt
Action 4: Google Sheets - Create row in 'Bonds Trading 24/7 Log'
Action 5: Filter - Only continue if opportunity detected
Action 6: Slack - Send message to #bonds-trading
Test and turn ON
unfinished_items.verification: Check Google Sheets for hourly updates

steps: Open Zapier Editor
Create new zap: '24-Hour Global Trading'
Trigger: Webhooks by Zapier - Catch Hook
Action 1: Filter - Signal strength > 70%
Action 2: Anthropic (Claude) - Conversation (technical analysis)
Action 3: ChatGPT - Conversation (strategy validation)
Action 4: Google Sheets - Lookup current portfolio
Action 5: Google Sheets - Create row in '24-Hour Trading Log'
Action 6: Slack - Send trading signal with AI analysis
Test webhook and turn ON
unfinished_items.verification: Webhook URL ready for TradingView alerts

unfinished_items.task: Build Zapier zap: API Health Check Dashboard
steps: Open Zapier Editor
Create new zap: 'API Health Check Dashboard'
Trigger: Schedule by Zapier (daily at 6 AM)
Action 1: ChatGPT - Test conversation (verify OpenAI API)
Action 2: Anthropic (Claude) - Test conversation (verify Anthropic API)
Action 3: Google Gemini - Test content generation (verify Gemini API)
Action 4: Webhooks - GET OKX Bitcoin price (verify OKX API)
Action 5: Webhooks - GET Treasury bond rates (verify Treasury API)
Action 6: Google Sheets - Update 'API Status Dashboard' with all results
Action 7: Filter - Only continue if any API failed
Action 8: Slack - Alert if failures detected
Test and turn ON
unfinished_items.verification: Check Google Sheets 'API Status Dashboard' daily

unfinished_items.task: Build Zapier zap: Trading Results Auto-Dashboard
steps: Open Zapier Editor
Create new zap: 'Trading Results Auto-Dashboard'
Trigger: Schedule by Zapier (every 6 hours)
Action 1: Google Sheets - Lookup rows from '24-Hour Trading Log' (today's trades)
Action 2: Code by Zapier - Calculate total P&L, win rate, best/worst trades
Action 3: Google Gemini - Analyze performance and generate insights
Action 4: Google Sheets - Update 'Trading Dashboard Summary'
Action 5: Slack - Post dashboard update to #trading-results
Test and turn ON
